    • Constructor Detail

      • FandomArticleSection

        public FandomArticleSection(java.lang.String title,
                            int index,
                            int tocLevel,
                            int level,
                            java.lang.String number,
                            long byteOffset,
                            java.lang.String anchor,
                            FandomArticle article)
        Creates a new FandomArticleSection instance (shouldn't be used manually!).

        Use FandomArticle.getSections() instead.

        Parameters:
        title - the title
        index - the index
        tocLevel - the TOC-level
        level - the level
        number - the number
        byteOffset - the offset in bytes
        anchor - the anchor title
        article - the article
